isis.stitle: ALTERNATOR: DELCO-REMY 26-SI SERIES - REPAIR PROCEDURES - RECTIFIER BRIDGE REPLACEMENT

svcproc.title: RECTIFIER BRIDGE REPLACEMENT
svcproc.para: If there is a bad diode in the rectifier bridge, replace the rectifier bridge as follows:

step1.para: Separate the rectifier end frame from the drive end frame.
Remove the rectifier bridge assembly from the end frame by detaching the regulator lead from the bridge assembly, the heat sink mounting screws and the alternator output terminal.

important.para: Note the round insulators under the heat sink mounting screws and the flat insulator located behind the heat sink. The silicone grease on both sides of the flat insulator provides the necessary heat transfer between heat sink and end frame. Re-apply silicone grease to both sides of the flat insulator during assembly.

step1.para: Tighten heat sink mounting screws loosely, securely tighten output terminals, then securely tighten the heat sink screws.
